Interface ShoppingCart

public interface ShoppingCart
Shopping cart used to hold an array bag of cart items.
Author:
tylercambron

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addItem​(int index, CartItem item)
    Adds an item and an index.
    void addItem​(CartItem item)
    Adds an item in most available location starting from zero.
    void empty()
    Empties every item from cart.
    int getAmountOfItem​(CartItem item)
    Counts up the amount of a duplicate item.
    CartItem getItem​(int index)
    Gets and returns item by the index.
    float getTotalPrice()
    Gathers all items and adds their prices together.
    boolean isEmpty()
    Checks if cart has any items or not.
    void removeItem​(int index)
    Removes item at index.
    void removeItem​(CartItem item)
    Removes all items from the cart matching parameter "item".

  • Method Details

    • empty

      void empty()
      Empties every item from cart.

    • isEmpty

      boolean isEmpty()
      Checks if cart has any items or not.
      Returns:
      whether there are items.

    • addItem

      void addItem​(CartItem item)
      Adds an item in most available location starting from zero.
      Parameters:
      item - being appended to the shopping cart.

    • addItem

      void addItem​(int index, CartItem item)
      Adds an item and an index.
      Parameters:
      index - integer value where the item is inserted.
      item - value being inserted at index.

    • removeItem

      void removeItem​(int index)
      Removes item at index.
      Parameters:
      index - integer value describing an item in the cart.

    • removeItem

      void removeItem​(CartItem item)
      Removes all items from the cart matching parameter "item".
      Parameters:
      item - CartItem value being compared.

    • getItem

      CartItem getItem​(int index)
      Gets and returns item by the index.
      Parameters:
      index - integer describing a value in the cart.
      Returns:
      the item at index.

    • getAmountOfItem

      int getAmountOfItem​(CartItem item)
      Counts up the amount of a duplicate item.
      Parameters:
      item - is what we are comparing the other too, finding the duplicate.
      Returns:
      the integer amount of items that are the same.

    • getTotalPrice

      float getTotalPrice()
      Gathers all items and adds their prices together.
      Returns:
      the total prices added up inside the cart.
